name: Save Your Princess Inc.
description:
These days princesses get saved so often that you decided to start a business around it.
Clients will offer you new jobs every day, be prepared!

Obtain new weapons and equipment to face increasingly harder challenges and upgrade your activity.

Move with WASD
Pick up princess with E
Attack with LMB
Secondary attack (ring) with RMB
Pause with ESC

Soundtrack made with CodeParade's Neural Composer
All sprites were made with Dall-e 2 (no artis was replaces in the making of this game)
